extendedInfo.description: United States Air Force PFA (Physical Fitness Assessment) Calculator (both Male & Female) using the latest scoring charts (effective July 2010). Included are the following calculators:- PFT individual scores, total, fitness category, health risk with their minimum requirements- 1 Mile Walk Time- BMT (Basic Military Training) PF Calculator- Military Body Fat PercentageIt also includes minimum and maximum weight standards and acceptable body fat standards. You can also choose to email/share a copy of your results for any calculation.

reviews.title: Screen Shot isn\'t the same
reviews.comment: I re-installed this app again to see if I was missing something, but NO I wasn\'t. The screen shot in the app description isn\'t the same after you install this app. There\'s no button on the top row for exemptions or anything else in that matter, very disappointed by the false advertisement.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great!!
reviews.comment: Just checked it against the calculator on AFFMS. good to go. However, needs exemptions.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs exemptions
reviews.comment: The lack of exemptions alters the score by quite a bit when using it to plan and measure actual performance.   Useless for anyone on a profile.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 1 problem
reviews.comment: The overall score rounds up and down, however the AF does not. I just wish that could be fixed but other than that...it worked perfectly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Accurate, identical to pt test score I received.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: NEEDS EXEMPTIONS ADDED TO BE USEFUL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great! And I got a 91!!! Whoooo

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Not 100% it needs exemption options!!! WORTHLESS

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Add exemptions then it truly will be a useful tool.

reviews.title: Careful
reviews.comment: Setting run time format to \'minutes\' still calculates as \'min.sec\' (ex. 11.5 calculates score for 11m05s in both modes, not 11m30s as expected)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: FIX
reviews.comment: Fix it so it shows your actual score, not a rounded version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs exemptions
reviews.comment: Good handy app but it would be even more useful with the ability to add exemptions and calculate the score that way.

reviews.comment: Needs to be able to make calculations with exemptions. No exemption options available. Overall pretty good app though.

reviews.comment: No exemption options!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Push up and sit up for age group 30-39 is not correct. Fix for higher rating.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Push up scoring incorrect for age group 30-39. Shows 10pts for 55 push ups. Dont put all your trust in this app.

reviews.comment: Great tool. But needs to have ability to add scores when someone cant do certain parts because of waiver
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works as advertised. 4 stars after adding the scoring chart for a good visual of all categories.

reviews.comment: Good that it lists the minimum requirements, but would be better if it listed the max points too!
reviews.author: A Google User
